meanings.definition: A relationship or association between people or things.
meanings.sent1: Family connexions are important for a sense of belonging.
meanings.sent2: The connexions between the characters in the story were complex.
meanings.sent3: The connexions between the cats and dogs in the neighborhood led to funny encounters.
meanings.sent4: The connexions between the stars in the sky create beautiful constellations.
meanings.sent5: The connexions between the different parts of the brain help us think and feel.

meanings.definition: The action of connecting or linking things together.
meanings.sent1: The connexions of the train tracks allow trains to travel long distances.
meanings.sent2: The connexions of the internet make it possible to communicate globally.
meanings.sent3: The connexions of the puzzle pieces were tricky to figure out.
meanings.sent4: The connexions of the pipes in the house ensure water flows smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The connexions of the roads in the city create a network for transportation.

meanings.definition: A person with whom one has social or professional contact.
meanings.sent1: Sheila is one of my oldest connexions from high school.
meanings.sent2: Networking events are great for making new connexions in the industry.
meanings.sent3: My connexion at the company always has the best office gossip.
meanings.sent4: As a journalist, building connexions with sources is crucial for getting stories.
meanings.sent5: My connexion at the library recommended a great book to me.
